node.title: Episode 3- Wildwood Lifestyle Center & Hospital
node.description: Wildwood Lifestyle Center & Hospital is a supporting ministry dedicated to following the divine plan for educating and assisting others in the development of a closer relationship with Christ and the achievement of optimum health through the restoration of body, mind, and soul. Wildwood, located in state of Georgia, also played an integral role in the founding of OCI in 1983.
